snippet: The Federal Aviation Administration has agreed to study the safety of using portable electronics such as e-readers and tablets on planes during takeoff and landing, a practice that is currently disallowed.
abstract: The Federal Aviation Administration has agreed to study the safety of using portable electronics such as e-readers and tablets on planes during takeoff and landing, a practice that is currently disallowed.

headline.main: Teaching the F.A.A. That Dogs Don't Buckle Up
headline.print_headline: Teaching the F.A.A. Dogs Don’t Buckle Up
